Debug Console

{function="date('Y-m-d H:i:s')"}
{loop="$debug"}
{if="$value['type'] == CDEBUG_TOKEN_MESSAGE"}
{$value['stringToken']} {$value['value']}
triggered on {$value['srcFilename']} in line {$value['line']}
{elseif=" $value['type'] == CDEBUG_TOKEN_CHECKPOINT"}
{$value['stringToken']} {$value['value']}
triggered on {$value['srcFilename']} in line {$value['line']}
{else}
{$value['stringToken']} ${$value['name']}
value | source | trace 
{function="print_r($value['value'],true)"}
{function="urldecode($value['srcLine'])"}
{loop="$value['trace']"}
> {$value['function']} triggered on {function="basename($value['file'])"} in line {$value['line']}
{/loop}
triggered on {$value['srcFilename']} in line {$value['line']}
{/if}
{/loop} {loop="$errors"}
{$value['stringToken']} {$value['value']}
value | source | trace 
{function="print_r($value['value'],true)"}
{function="urldecode($value['srcLine'])"}
{loop="$value['trace']"}
> 
{function="print_r($value,1)"}
{/loop}
triggered on {$value['srcFilename']} in line {$value['line']}
{/loop}
